channel.title: Works on A J Greengrove's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Works on A J Greengrove's Site

item.title: Single Release: "Prelude (NES Ver. Final Fantasy I)"
item.description: It’s time to start getting into game soundtracks: here’s the first release on that path, “Prelude NES Ver. Final Fantasy I”. In addition to the prelude it features “Game Over” from the original soundtrack. To be clear, these are guitar covers.

item.title: Gene Boggs - Eponymous (Featuring A J Greengrove) Album Release
item.description: “Eponymous:” an almost unlikely combination of electronica and mellow guitars.

item.title: Wherever the Wind Takes Me - Album Release!
item.description: “This ‘dungeon nylon guitar’ album ranges from early music pastiches to soundtrack-like music, or fantasias if you will. A great way to start this ‘dungeon crawl’ of game soundtracks.”
